mapper.select: SELECT jpt.id post_id, jpt.title, jpt.c_info_id, jpt.deadline, cit.logo, cit.name, cit.address FROM JOB_POST_TB jpt INNER JOIN COMPANY_INFO_TB cit ON jpt.c_info_id = cit.id;
select id, title from job_post_tb where c_info_id = #{cInfoId}
mapper.insert: insert into job_post_tb (title, c_info_id, career, pay, condition, start_hour, end_hour, deadline, c_intro, job_intro, created_at) values(#{title}, #{cInfoId}, #{career}, #{pay}, #{condition}, #{startHour}, #{endHour}, #{deadline}, #{cIntro}, #{jobIntro}, now())
mapper.update: update job_post_tb set title = #{title}, c_info_id = #{cInfoId}, career = #{career}, pay = #{pay}, condition = #{condition}, start_hour = #{startHour}, end_hour = #{endHour}, deadline = #{deadline}, c_intro = #{cIntro}, job_intro = #{jobIntro}, created_at = #{createdAt} where id = #{id}
